S3OutputLocation.description: The Amazon Simple Storage (S3) bucket URI
S3OutputLocation.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Simple Storage (S3) bucket URI

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^s3://([^/]+)/?(.*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyId.description: The KMS key id used for encryption on the S3 bucket
KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
The KMS key id used for encryption on the S3 bucket

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

EdgeOutputConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: Key-value pair to associate as a tag for the resource

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^((?!aws:)[\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The key value of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The key value of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Type: String

Update requires: Replacement
